attributes.action: Take control of electricity, gas, water... utilities by switching payments directly from Treasury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Increasing PAYE to off-set that paid by the Treasury will identify properties in need of modernisation, if not demolition, for current & future generations.

Utilities currently hold records of consumer-usage together with charges; it only requires the will to control the 'administration-fee' received by utility-companies.

1998 Deregulation omitted critical-requirement to identify tenants in a given-property [counter-terrorism...].
